p: Experimental studies showed that HS has antimicrobial, antioxidant, anticholesterol, antihypertensive activity [ 21]. The people of Jordan’s North Badialocality use leaves and flowers of HS, and according to them, hot aqua infusions are used to treat elevated blood pressure while cold infusions for lower blood pressure [ 22]. In Tobago and Trinidad area’s resident’s leaves are used to treat hypertension while the flower and seeds are used forhypocholesterolemic effect [ 23, 24].
